document.full_text: thousands demanded the overthrow of president bashar al-assad on monday at the funerals of 17 protesters killed in the syrian city of homs as pro-democracy protests intensified despite a promise to lift emergency law.
document.title: thousands demand overthrow of assad after deaths
lines_and_colors: thousands demanded the overthrow of president bashar al-assad on monday at the funerals of 17 protesters killed in the syrian city of homs as pro-democracy protests intensified despite a promise to lift emergency law.
